title: Construction of a Type of Mean interval : Who Gets Paid More?
question_text:
You have probably heard that men are typically paid more than women for the same type of job. A researcher wanted to investigate this claim. Using information from a census, the researcher randomly selected $10$ occupations and looked at the median salary (in dollars) for men and women from each occupation.
